title: Publishing Information
description: The current published state of all editions of a content item as well as any scheduled publishing information. Machine-generated.

has_published_edition.title: Has Published Edition
has_published_edition.description: True if and only if at least one published edition exists for this content item.

editions.description: A map of edition names to the current publish state for that edition

scheduled_operations.title: Scheduled Operations
scheduled_operations.description: A map of lists of operations scheduled to be performed on this content item, sorted by operation type.

operation_revision_id.title: Revision ID (Operation)
operation_revision_id.description: The revision id to be published.

operation_edition.title: Edition Name (Operation)
operation_edition.description: The name of the edition this operation will publish to.

operation_date.title: Operation Date
operation_date.description: The date that this operation will be performed.

operation_edition.title: Edition Name (Operation)
operation_edition.description: The name of the edition this operation will publish to.

operation_date.title: Operation Date
operation_date.description: The date that this operation will be performed.

edition_name.title: Edition Name
edition_name.description: The machine-readable identifier of this edition. This should be the same as the key in 'editions' for the edition object.

edition_date.title: Edition Date
edition_date.description: The machine-generated date that this edition was last updated (i.e., that the content item was published/unpublished to a particular destination.)

edition_first_publish_date.title: First Published Date (Edition)
edition_first_publish_date.description: The machine-generated date that this edition was created for the first time (i.e., that the content item was first published.)

edition_display_date.title: Display Date (Edition)
edition_display_date.description: The human-editable date that should be shown to readers as the 'date' for this content item. When viewing the story at this edition name directly, this will override whatever value is set for Display Date on the story directly. After an edition is created, subsequent updates to that edition will not change this date unless otherwise specified.

edition_publish_date.title: Publish Date (Edition)
edition_publish_date.description: The machine-editable date that should be shown to readers as the 'publish date' for this content item. When viewing the story at this edition name directly, this will override whatever value is set for Publish Date on the story directly. Every time an edition is updated (i.e. a story is republished) this date will also be updated unless otherwise specified.

edition_published.title: Publish Status
edition_published.description: If false, this edition has been deleted/unpublished.

edition_revision_id.title: Revision ID
edition_revision_id.description: The id of the revision that this edition was created from. Omitted if unpublished.
